serialization.name: Text Output
serialization.description: This shows a BlockX component doing text output from XML source.

strings.jsxxml: <catalog> <product> <name>Interocitor</name> <price>400</price> <description><![CDATA[A strange, amazing device of alien origin that has many wonderful properties. It uses the highest quality parts, from its bead condenser to its cathermin tube and intensifier disk. We'd show you a photo, but our camera just picks up black fog when we take pictures.]]></description> </product> </catalog>
strings.jsxxsl: <xsl:stylesheet version="1.0" xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform"> <xsl:output method="text"/> <xsl:template match="/"> <xsl:for-each select="catalog/product"> <xsl:value-of select="name"/> Cost: <xsl:value-of select="price"/> <xsl:value-of select="description"/> </xsl:for-each> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>
